Topic.Title: how to send messages to users, MANOWAR

Posts.EditableText:
Hallo. I Can't find out how to send messages to other users. I click the little email icon on the top right corner and all I can see is that noone ever wrote me a message. There is no "write a new message" button anywhere.
I wanted to ask Manowar if he could delete all the games I flagged as "delete please" or at least tell me how to do it myself. I'm drowning in drafts e wrong starts that I cannot delete nor modify once uploaded...
Posts.HTML:
Hallo. I Can't find out how to send messages to other users. I click the little email icon on the top right corner and all I can see is that noone ever wrote me a message. There is no "write a new message" button anywhere.
I wanted to ask Manowar if he could delete all the games I flagged as "delete please" or at least tell me how to do it myself. I'm drowning in drafts e wrong starts that I cannot delete nor modify once uploaded...

Posts.EditableText: If you click on someone's name. inside their profile page there's an envelope next to their name (top left). Clicking that opens up the mail to send.
Posts.HTML: If you click on someone's name. inside their profile page there's an envelope next to their name (top left). Clicking that opens up the mail to send.
